attributes.action: Close Retail Outlets & Supermarkets on Sundays and Bank Holidays.
attributes.background: Close retail outlets on Sundays, Bank Holidays and Christmas and stop 24 hour opening. Give workers the opportunity to spend valuable time with their families. Like It was years ago - do we really need the shops open 24/7, Sunday's and Bank holidays?

rejection.details:
We understand that you want the Government to restrict the opening hours of shops, but it's not clear exactly what changes you want the Government to make in terms of shops being allowed to open for 24 hours a day.

You could start a new petition that clearly states what new restrictions you want the Government to impose on shop opening hours.
